channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
i got a source....... http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IXTFUDG5 and i cant change what the npcs say i go into npc handler and do that..... but when i put the server back up it doesnt work please help and when i comply it says
the system can not find the path specifed the system can not find the path specifed Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @mod_SYN mod SYN
item.description:
@mod_SYN wrote:

Ok what you do is use MOD TAHAROK’s server guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html and all the information is right there

Enjoy…happy playing!
